message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'es.bsc.distrostreamlib.api.files.FileDistroStream' import. Should be before 'java.util.List'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'es.bsc.distrostreamlib.exceptions.BackendException' import. Should be before 'java.util.List'.
WhitespaceAround: '=' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: '=' is not preceded with whitespace.
